front.title: PCN Boundary Node Behaviour for the HOSE Mode of Operation

abstract.t: Precongestion notification (PCN) is a means for protecting quality ofservice for inelastic traffic admitted to a Diffserv domain. Theoverall PCN architecture is described in RFC 5559. This memo is oneof a series describing possible boundary node behaviours for a PCNdomain. The behaviour described here is denoted as the HOSE model.
